hackathon-description-text: EmpowerHack is a collective that brings creates sustainable design for women and girls in humanitarian contexts. Bridging the gap between technology, design, and NGOs to address key challenges, Empower Hack galvanises volunteers to create code that crosses borders.

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: no prizes! We build open source with a view to continue projects at future hacks!

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=133 Bethnal Green Rd, London E2, UK
hackathon-location-address: 133 Bethnal Green Rd, London E2, UK
hackathon-description-header: A collaborative hackathon and community for empowering women and girl refugees around the world
